description_html:
REGATTA is sociable, comfortable and designed for smooth sailing.
Suitable for residential, hospitality and commercial applications alike.

REGATTA is Ted’s self-imposed design assignment to explore the core ideas of ‘the sectional’...bringing people together in comfort.
The resulting curvaceous forms of REGATTA come together to create infinite, scalable configurations. Most pieces are designed to be used individually but are best linked together into a flotilla of comfort.

Each of the thirteen pieces has a gentle arc along its back that aligns with others to create a grand embracing arc and a continuous flow of comfort at every turn. The winged backs align to form apertures while keeping the group open and dynamic from all perspectives.
